name: Watermelon Fight
description:
Watermelon fight was made in 8 hours for the Berlin minijam of April 2016.

----------

Henri : Code

Sugar : Assets

----------

Two watermelons gained consciousness at the back of a truck, and are trying to squish each other !

Required : 2 players, 1 controller.

----------

PLAYER 1

LEFT STICK  ↔  :  Move

LEFT STICK  ↑  :   Dodge

LT : Punch

LB : Grab / Throw

VIEW : Restart game

----------

PLAYER 2

RIGHT STICK  ↔  :  Move

RIGHT STICK  ↑  :   Dodge

RT : Punch

RB : Grab / Throw

MENU : Restart game
